analysis.description: BAIToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/5/0xdc4c6478517d3653b9e8371187acb579f3739462.sol#317-324) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0xdc4c6478517d3653b9e8371187acb579f3739462.sol:
	Contract BAIToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0xdc4c6478517d3653b9e8371187acb579f3739462.sol#167)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

BAIToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/5/0xdc4c6478517d3653b9e8371187acb579f3739462.sol#291-295) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/5/0xdc4c6478517d3653b9e8371187acb579f3739462.sol#294)

BAIToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/5/0xdc4c6478517d3653b9e8371187acb579f3739462.sol#317-324)
	- /unique_chucks/5/0xdc4c6478517d3653b9e8371187acb579f3739462.sol#322-323
BAIToken.MONTH should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xdc4c6478517d3653b9e8371187acb579f3739462.sol#119-120)
